title: Multicultural Interior Design Project-Based Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Interior Design Principles and Familiarity with CAD Software
context.additional_context: Curriculum reflecting global design market demands centered on the United States

learning_goals: They can plan and execute interior design projects reflecting historical backgrounds of diverse cultures
They can apply international design standards in practice, including metric scale implementation and traditional color/form selections
They can analyze and present ethical design decision-making processes in multicultural environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
